name: Resume Templates for Notion (3x)
description: A pack of 3 Notion resume templatesDesigned to help the dedicated job hunter land their next dream job.With the Notion Resume Template Pack, you get access to 3 customizable Notion resume templates. Fill out your info and download as .pdf file in a few clicks.Testimonials Frequently Asked Questions Who is the Notion Resume Template Pack for? It's for dedicated job hunters looking for their new dream job using these pre-built resume templates to set up their resume in a few clicks. What is Notion
features: Who is the Notion Resume Template Pack for?It's for dedicated job hunters looking for their new dream job using these pre-built resume templates to set up their resume in a few clicks.; Do I need to be on a paid Notion plan to use this?Not at all. You can use all the features of this template without a paid Notion plan.; What happens after I purchase?After your purchase, you will be redirected to a Notion page containing the template. From here, you can duplicate the template into your own workspace.; Can I make changes to this template?Of course. Templates are meant to be customized to your own needs, so after duplicating you can and should edit it as much as you like.; Who are you?I amPascio, official Notion Ambassador, Consultant & Creator of more than 50+ free & premium Notion templates that have served 100,000+ people across the globe.; Can I share this with anyone else?No. This product has a private license. If you wish to share it with someone, please direct them to this page.; Can I be your affiliate?Sure thing! You can sign up as an affiliatehere.
